issue.title: [C++] TestHadoopFileSystem::ThreadSafety fails with sigabort
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7354](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7354). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/branches/all?utf8=✓&query=hdfs
